idle.command: osascript -e "display notification \"Worktree: ${CCMANAGER_WORKTREE}\nBranch: ${CCMANAGER_WORKTREE_BRANCH}\" with title \"ccmanager is now idle\""

waiting_input.command: osascript -e "display notification \"Worktree: ${CCMANAGER_WORKTREE}\nBranch: ${CCMANAGER_WORKTREE_BRANCH}\" with title \"CCManager Waiting for Input\""
